revised_title: The Exact Histological Localization of the Visual Area of the Human Cerebral Cortex
tldr: The author investigates the histological localization of the visual area in the human cerebral cortex, identifying the exact region responsible for visuo-sensory function. The study examines six normal and pathological brains, mapping the distribution of the visual area and its changes in cases of old-standing optic atrophy and anophthalmos.
